location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 71 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū] to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a dispatch conveyed from Bombay by the HC Cruizer Nautilus; it confirms that the dispatches for Tehran and Bussora [Basra] contained within have been forwarded on.
